lead_paragraph: Archbishop J. Peter Sartain apologized for the actions of 77 people, including priests and deacons, who abused minors in western Washington over the past several decades.
snippet: Archbishop J. Peter Sartain apologized for the actions of 77 people, including priests and deacons, who abused minors in western Washington over the past several decades.

headline.main: Archdiocese of Seattle Names 77 People as Child Abusers
headline.print_headline: Seattle Archdiocese, Citing ‘Transparency and Accountability,’ Names 77 as Child Abusers

abstract: Archbishop J Peter Sartain of Seattle publishes list of 77 child-sex abusers who have served Roman Catholic Church in Washington State and apologizes for their actions in effort to increase transparency and accountability.
